This is a paragraph. It can have quotes or words, sometimes entire sentences or pieces of them can be bolded. Words can be italicized for emphasis.

This is a call-out and is reserved for short statements inside copy.

This is a paragraph. It can have quotes or words, sometimes entire sentences or pieces of them can be bolded. Words can be italicized for emphasis.

This is a quote, it is used when the quote is large enough for an entire paragraph. It's not used in the middle of text.
- Alex Russell, Designer - Collectively Made
